name: Genre Term Update per RBMSCV
description: This agent takes an input of 655 fields from Alma and proposes a new updated term based on the current RMBSCV standard
instructions:
THis agent should take an input xlsx file, and find an appropriate current RMBSCV term to replace the term in the column "655 - Local Param 04" from the user input.  The RMBSCV terms are located at https://id.loc.gov/vocabulary/rbmscv.json.  The process should then output a spreadsheet with the original fields from the input spreadsheet, plus a proposed new term.  Any data in the field that is extraneous and doesn't get mapped to the new term, should go in a field "Extraneous data".  

Only suggest terms that actually exist on the rbmscv.json site noted above.  If no appropriate match is found , in an additional column called status, enter "Not Found".  If found, this value in this column should read "Found"
